product_name: Name of the final binary, can differ from plugin_name
macos_output_dir: Name of output directory for final VST binary (Optional if on Windows)
win_output_dir: Name of output directory for final VST binary (Optional if on MacOS)
plugin_manufacturer: 4 character id with at least one uppercase character
code_name: UID with 4 characters and at least one uppercase letter
author: standardpointer
description: A short description of your plugin
